# 交换机

## 指令

### 7150

- enable 进入特权模式
- disable 推出特权模式
- configure terminal 全局配置
- exit 退出当前配置
- show interface status 查看端口 / show inter et49 简写
- 在config下 shutdown / no shutdown重启接口
- 查看收发光 show interface [et1] transceiver
- vlan配置
    - `show vlan 740` & `vlan 740`
    - `interface et2` & `switchport mode access/trunk` & `switchport access vlan 740` |
      `switchport trunk allowed vlan 740`
    - `no vlan 740` | `no switchport access vlan 740`

#### 用户和公钥

- 创建用户
  `username xuzhe privilege 15 role network-admin secret sha512 $6$g7losEGHOY.9NZWL$84WL6SDn5lU7fKA9sZS.cn/A8tffWp1eRYUySuEeHre5aOcj4v5lfMb0U9kl4NJDt6PCEPfHGvTkWOcxaKIMV0`
- 添加公钥
  `username xuzhe ssh-key ssh-rsa  xuzhe-hz-office`

### 7130

- show running-config 查看当前运行配置
- config 下 app metaMux 配置mux
    - 配置source int ap1 source et1
    - 存贮 copy running-config startup-config
- config terminal 进入配置
    - interface et26
    - show ? 查看指令active/destination/source
    - 存贮 write memory
